entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
